landingPage.CoinParagraph: We've gone crazy! We have created the true way to get Twitch subscriptions, PlayStation 5, money, gift cards and thousands of products for free.
landingPage.completeTasksParagraph: The only thing you need to do in order to get the points is to download the apps of the most famous brands, then follow them in the social network of your choice, visit its webpage, fill a survey or post on instagram or Twitter and that's it! You will see your points increasing.
landingPage.winRewardsParagraph: Now you just have to redeem your points for products or services. You can choose from a subscription to your Twitch's favourite streamer, obtaining money through Paypal, redeem your points for e-commerce products or even gift cards. Start earning money now! We do the rest.
landingPage.redeem: Redeem your points for the rewards of your choice
landingPage.createCampaign: Create your custom campaign for best results with the help of our actions.
landingPage.stepAway: You are one step away from creating an extremely effective targeted campaign
landingPage.fillDetail: Fill in your details so we can get started
landingPage.wouldYouLikeToText: Would you like to create a Dropforcoin campaign? Please contact our sales team at:
